Trigonometric Identities / Simplifier

Enter a trig expression (e.g. "sin(x)^2 + cos(x)^2"):

Common Trig Identities:

  • sin²x + cos²x = 1
  • 1 + tan²x = sec²x
  • 1 + cot²x = csc²x
  • sin(2x) = 2 sin(x) cos(x)
  • cos(2x) = cos²x - sin²x = 2cos²x - 1 = 1 - 2sin²x
  • tan(2x) = 2 tan(x) / [1 - tan²x]
